meanings.sent1: The effulgence of the sun filled the sky with light.
meanings.sent2: The effulgence of the stars was breathtaking on a clear night.
meanings.sent3: The effulgence of the disco ball made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an effulgence that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The effulgence of the fireworks painted the night sky with colors.

meanings.definition: The quality of being bright and radiant.
meanings.sent1: The effulgence of her personality brought joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The effulgence of the diamond made it sparkle in the light.
meanings.sent3: The effulgence of the neon sign made it impossible to miss.
meanings.sent4: The effulgence of the moonlight reflected on the calm lake.
meanings.sent5: The effulgence of the fireflies created a magical atmosphere in the garden.
